text: Galilea Airport is an airport serving the river town of Puerto Galilea (es) in the Amazonas Region of Peru. The runway is south of the town, which is within a bend of the Rio Santiago, a tributary of the Marañón River, the principal source of the Amazon River. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Galilea *OurAirports - Galilea *SkyVector - Galilea Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in Amazonas Region
title: Galilea Airport
